athithaye wu loka kusalana tharanga waladi muhuna pana lada pradhana gatalu wuye mahadwipa athara gamanagamanaye wu dushkaratha ha yuddhaya yi. 1934 saha 1938 tharanga sandaha dakunu amerikanu kandayam kipayakata pamanak sahabhagi wimata haki wu athara awastha dekedi ma brasila jathikayan samanga tharanga wadimata sitiye mowun pamani. 1942 saha 1946 warsha wala ntsi jarmaniye saha brasilaye pawathwimata thibu tharanga dewana loka yuddhaya nisawen awalangu wiya.

40 ekala, laduru rogiyek un wahanse wetha awuth danin wati, ''oba kamathi sek nam, ma pawithra karanna obata haki ya''yi ayada sitiye ya. 41 un wahanse mahanukampawen atha digu kota ohu pita thaba, ''mama kamaththemi, pawithra wanna''yi wadala seka. 42 ekenehi ma laduru rogaya paha wi ohu pawithra karanu labi ya. 43 un wahanse, ''me gana kisiwekuta kisiwak nokiyana lesa balaganna''yi ohuta thadin ana di, 44 ''yanna, pujakaya idiriyehi peni sitinna; mosesge niyamaya paridi pawithrawime sahathikayak lesa puja oppu karanna'' kiya ohu waha pitath kara yawu seka. 45 eheth, ohu gos ee mulu siddhiya prasiddha lesa kiya kiya, dasa desa pathuruwa hariye ya.
